member.name: M:Ekip.Framework.Services.ServiceBaseCore`2.DeepLoad(`0,System.Boolean,Ekip.Framework.Data.DeepLoadType,System.Type[],Ekip.Framework.Data.Bases.DeepSession)
member.summary: Deep Load the entire Entity object with criteria based on the child types array and the DeepLoadType.
member.remarks: Use this method with caution as it is possible to DeepLoad with recursion and traverse an entire collection's object graph.
member.param: The Entity object to load.

A flag that indicates whether to recursively load all Property Collections that are descendants of this instance. If True, loads the complete object graph below this object. If False, loads this object only.
DeepLoadType Enumeration to Include/Exclude object property collections from Load.
Entity Property Collection Type Array To Include or Exclude from Load.
A collection of child types for easy access.

member.remarks: Use this method with caution as it is possible to DeepLoad with Recursion and traverse an entire collection's object graph.
member.param: TList of Entity objects to load.

A flag that indicates whether to recursively load all Property Collections that are descendants of this instance. If True, loads the complete object graph below this object. If False, loads this object only.
DeepLoadType Enumeration to Include/Exclude object property collections from Load.
Entity Property Collection Type Array To Include or Exclude from Load.
